column5: I was having a talk with some friends. I was explaining that you can buy a tiller steer motor upwards of 150HP.... they called me stupid and didn't believe me !  Whats the biggest tiller style motor available ?
here is a lund with a 250vtiller
Yeah, Mercury's new "Big Tiller" system. You can pretty much put a tiller handle on any of their new motors, add hydrualics, and you're good to go.
you can slap that pic in your friends lap and see what they say haha  Here is Oakville there is a guy with a 175 tiller.

Mercury will put their Big Tiller handle on just about anything they make. I saw a 250 Pro XS with tiller steering last year, on the back of a Lund 2075. Didn't have an opportunity to drive it, but would have enjoyed taking it for a spin.
Hell yeah, that's my dream rig!!!  S.
haha you can say that again !!!! I want a 300 Verado tiller now ! hahahah
I've driven a 2010 Predator with a 250 Opti it flies! Its 62 or so GPS.  The Big tiller system is awesome, but so is the Titan steering add on for Yammy and other brands.
Be interesting to listen in to the comments from the console snobs as that thing passed them by.  JF
